name: fullstack-monorepo
description: Fullstack monorepo with NestJS and Angular
author: Reynaldo Columna

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && ng serve" "cd backend && npm run start:dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && ng build --configuration production && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist && npm run build
scripts.emulate: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run check-paths && firebase emulators:start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test:all: cd frontend && ng test && cd ../backend && npm run test
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend && ng lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:backend && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.update:deps: npm update && cd frontend && npm update && cd ../backend && npm update
